mapper.sql: id, activate_id, user_id, (select real_name from user_info m where m.id = user_id), is_drive, is_family, is_manned, is_participate, boarding_location, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into activate_personnel_list (id, activate_id, user_id, boarding_location, is_drive, is_family, is_manned, is_participate, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boardingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDrive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isFamily,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isManned,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isParticipate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())

insert into activate_personnel_list
id,
activate_id,
user_id,
boarding_location,
is_drive,
is_family,
is_manned,
is_participate,
create_time,update_time

mapper.update:
update activate_personnel_list
activate_id = #{activateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
boarding_location = #{boardingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_drive = #{isDrive,jdbcType=BIT},
is_family = #{isFamily,jdbcType=BIT},
is_manned = #{isManned,jdbcType=BIT},
is_participate = #{isParticipate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activate_personnel_list set activate_id = #{activateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, boarding_location = #{boardingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_drive = #{isDrive,jdbcType=BIT}, is_family = #{isFamily,jdbcType=BIT}, is_manned = #{isManned,jdbcType=BIT}, is_participate = #{isParticipate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activate_personnel_list set is_participate = #{isParticipate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where is_participate = '1' and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and activate_id = #{activateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.user_id userId, b.real_name as realName, b.curr_location as currLocation, b.graduation_time as graduationTime, b.major as major, b.wechat_image as headImg from activate_personnel_list a, user_info b where a.user_id = b.id and a.is_participate = '1' and a.id = #{activate_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
